title: Carrot Raisin Salad Recipe
description: This carrot raisin salad with crushed pineapple is sweet and creamy with a splash of lemon for a bright flavor and an easy summer side dish.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Salad Vegetable Salad Recipes Carrot Salad Recipes Carrot Raisin Salad 5.0 (4) 3 Reviews 1 Photo This carrot raisin salad tastes great! I like to add crushed pineapple for a summery flavor. Sometimes I add shredded coconut as well. Submitted by Yoly Updated on April 22, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo Prep Time: 20 mins Chill Time: 2 hrs Total Time: 2 hrs 20 mins Servings: 12 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 12 servings 4 ½ cups shredded carrots 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, undrained (Optional) ¾ cup raisins ½ cup sugar or to taste 2 tablespoons sugar, or to taste ½ cup mayonnaise 1 ½ tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice Directions Combine carrots, pineapple with juice, raisins, ½ cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar (or to taste), mayonnaise, and lemon juice in a large bowl; mix well. Refrigerate for 2 hours before serving for flavors to meld for best results. name: Yoly
instructions: Combine carrots, pineapple with juice, raisins, ½ cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar (or to taste), mayonnaise, and lemon juice in a large bowl; mix well.;Refrigerate for 2 hours before serving for flavors to meld for best results.
